channel.title: productivity on deskriders
channel.description: Recent content in productivity on deskriders

item.title: Running Maven in Docker
item.description: Run this from the root of a maven project docker run -it --rm -v "$PWD":/home/src/gpt-fx -v "$HOME/.m2":/root/.m2 -w /home/src/gpt-fx maven:3.8.3-openjdk-17 mvn clean package -Ppackage
